thread.title: Report: Trump to Announce Move of U.S. Embassy in Israel on Monday
thread.title_full: Report: Trump to Announce Move of U.S. Embassy in Israel on Monday

author: Cortney O'Brien
title: Report: Trump to Announce Move of U.S. Embassy in Israel on Monday
text:
Share Tweet 
President Trump is expected to announce the move of the U.S. embassy in Tel Aviv to Jerusalem on Monday. Israeli news outlets first began reporting the rumors after Trump participated in a phone conference on Sunday with Israeli Prime Minister, but the White House confirmed they were in the "first steps" of relocating the embassy. UPDATE: White House confirms it is in discussions to move the US Embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem â€” Kay Burley (@KayBurley) January 22, 2017 
The move would be a significant one because Palestinians say they have territorial rights to the city as well. Tags:
